personalities.name: Lonely
personalities.flavor: At least a little bit! You might find that surprising, but do you think it might be a little true? You know what they say, though... We're all a bit lonely every now and then! You probably keep this fact of life to yourself, though. But if there's one thing that brings us all together... it's our need to go it solo! So, a lonely and solitary type like you...

personalities.name: Docile
personalities.flavor: You're quite sensitive to others! You listen attentively and respectfully, and you're quick to pick up on things. Because you're so good at listening, do you find that your friends tell you their problems and concerns often? Perhaps people laugh at you sometimes for being so earnest and not recognizing jokes for what they are. But you're always honestly surprised and bashful about this aspect of yourself... And then honestly laugh about it! So, a docile, sensitive type like you...

personalities.name: Quirky
personalities.flavor: You want to be on the cutting edge of fashion! You want to own all the latest stuff, right? But you grow bored of your old things and only like new things! You're true to your emotions, and you follow your desires. People have a hard time keeping up with you because you change so quickly. You may want to reflect upon how your words and actions affect others. So, a quirky type like you...

personalities.name: Brave
personalities.flavor: You don't know the meaning of fear! You're not afraid to keep moving forward in the face of danger. You also have a strong sense of justice and can't turn a blind eye to someone in trouble. But you sometimes push your own personal sense of justice a little too hard. Be careful that you don't get too pushy! So, a brave type like you...

personalities.name: Calm
personalities.flavor: You're very compassionate and considerate, and you put friends ahead of yourself. You're so generous and kindhearted that you can laugh, forgive, and forget when your friends make mistakes. But be aware that your compassion can sometimes get the best of you, putting you too far behind everyone else! So, a calm type like you...

personalities.name: Timid
personalities.flavor: You're quite gentle! You're sometimes a little shy about new things, aren't you? Do you miss out on some experiences because you get worried about the newness of the challenge? Of course, there's also a great benefit in being cautious, isn't there? After all, it keeps you nice and safe! You live life at your own speed, with no hurries and no worries! So, a timid and gentle type like you...

personalities.name: Jolly
personalities.flavor: You have a good sense of humor, and you're compassionate. You're always making others around you laugh. You have a sunny, positive outlook, and you have a vitality that raises the lowest spirits to giddy heights! Yet, for all your great cheer, you're also open to tears... But you bounce between laughter and tears so easily! What an adventure life must be like for you, bouncing around like that all day! So, a jolly type like you...

personalities.name: Relaxed
personalities.flavor: You're so casual, leisurely, and carefree. You don't rush or stress yourself out, and you don't worry about anything. You like to take a seat and kick up your feet! Oh, yes! You definitely have an easygoing personality, and you don't sweat the details. People naturally flock to you because they find you to be a free spirit, which is so refreshing! So, a relaxed type like you...

personalities.name: Quiet
personalities.flavor: And very calm! You're great with numbers, and you analyze information before making decisions. You rarely make mistakes, because you make decisions so calmly and rationally. You also may find it hard to guess what others are thinking, and they may find you a touch cold at times. You may not want to keep your feelings to yourself so much of the time. So, a quiet and calm type like you...

personalities.name: Hardy
personalities.flavor: And you're so determined! You don't whine or feel sorry for yourself, and you never need help with anything. You also have a strong sense of responsibility. You work toward your goals steadily and never require attention along the way. Your resilient spirit is the only thing you need to guide you toward your goals. But be careful! You risk wearing yourself out if you work too long all on your own! You should recognize that sometimes you need help from friends. So, a hardy, determined type like you...

personalities.name: Rash
personalities.flavor: Just a little bit hasty at times! You may run out of your house and forget to lock the door once in a while. And you may leave things like umbrellas behind when you leave places. Maybe you even dash outside in your slippers every now and then! Perhaps you even wear your shirts inside out all the time! Oh, is that even rasher than you really are? So sorry! But know that your friends think your funny little flubs are adorable! So, a rash and hasty type like you... Oh, wait! One more thing! You also sometimes reveal your friends' secrets by accident, don't you! Sorry. It had to be said! So, without further ado... a rash and hasty type like you...

personalities.name: Bold
personalities.flavor: You're so brave, and you never back down from anything! And you're also gutsy and brash in a way that others aren't! You're not shy about asking to take home all the leftovers at restaurants, right? If someone's treating you to dinner, you have no problem with ordering lots of good stuff! And you aren't fazed by doing things that most others would think twice about doing. Perhaps you don't even notice when others are upset with you! You know, you have the potential to become a truly great person... because you'll be the last one standing! So, a bold type like you...

personalities.name: Naive
personalities.flavor: You're so open and innocent! What a strong sense of curiosity you have! And you state your opinions purely, sharing exactly what you think. You also have an artistic spirit that isn't restrained by social conventions! You startle people with your spontaneity and vision. But when you overdo it, other people can have a hard time keeping up with you... Have you noticed people looking at you oddly? As if for no apparent reason? So, a naive, innocent type like you...

personalities.name: Impish
personalities.flavor: You really like to play a lot! And you enjoy eating a lot! You love competition, but you hate losing. Your personality seems crystal clear to others. With you, what you see is what you get! You cheer others with your dazzling smile. But you may be afraid of showing what's in your heart and revealing your true self. You may not want to keep your worries to yourself. You're only human, so ask your friends for advice when you need it. So, an impish type like you...

personalities.name: Hasty
personalities.flavor: You talk quickly! You eat quickly! You walk quickly! People often see you as a hard worker because you're always moving around so fast! But be careful! If you always rush so fast, you may make mistakes more often than others do. And what a waste that would be! Relax every now and then with a nice, deep breath! So, a hasty type like you...

personalities.name: Sassy
personalities.flavor: Or at least somewhat sassy! You don't like taking orders. You're a little rebellious and like to disagree. You're a lone wolf! You like to keep your distance from groups and go off to do things on your own. Older folks may be ones who find you the most disagreeable, even selfish. But people younger than you tend to really admire you! So, a sassy type like you...

questions.q: Have you ever blurted something out without thinking about the consequences first?
Do you want to be taller someday?
Once you've decided something, do you see it through to the end?
Have you ever said "Nice to meet you" to someone you said previously?
You're at a movie theater. What are you there to see?
Have you ever thought that if you dug into your backyard, you would find a buried treasure?
Do you prefer to play outside rather than inside?
You discover a beat-up looking treasure chest in some ruins. What do you do?

as.points: Impish Impish Brave Brave Rash Hasty Hasty

questions.q: Have you ever realized you were hogging the conversation?
When you see a switch, do you have an overwhelming urge to flip it?
Have you ever forgotten you bought something and bought another one?
Do you think it's important to always aim to be the best?
Do you want to be famous?
If you saw someone do something bad, could you scold them?
Have you ever told a joke that just completely fell flat?
Do you like lively parties?
Are you truly sincere when you apologize?
Do you like karaoke?
You're hiking up a mountain when you reach diverging paths. Which path do you take?
Your friend takes a spectacular fall! What do you do?
You have a really important test tomorrow! What do you do?

as.text: Wing it! I'm sure I'll be fine!
Test?! I think I have a fever...

questions.q: Have you ever accidentally called a teacher "Mom" or "Dad"?
There's a rumor there's a scary ghost haunting the school bathrooms! What do you do?
You're in class when you realize you really have to go to the restroom! What do you do?
Do you think you have good study habits?

as.text: Well, I never lose at sports!

questions.q: What's your studying habit?

as.text: I just cover what I need to do.
I can't really do it alone...

questions.q: You're packing your classroom's snacks when you get hungry! What do you do?

as.text: Hold myself back and pack it all up.
What snacks? They're in my belly!

questions.q: You see a cake that's past its expiration date, but only by one day. What do you do?

as.text: Turn it down briefly, then decide.
Get someone to try it first.

questions.q: You've stuffed yourself with a good meal when a great dessert arrives. What do you do?

as.text: Eat it. Who cares if I'm stuffed?
Turn it down. It's too fattening!
Yum! I love dessert the most!

questions.q: Your friend made a meal that tastes horrible. They ask, "How is it?". You say...?
You're eating at a very fancy restaurant known for its food. Which course do you select?
Everyone's sharing a dessert, and there's an extra piece. What do you do?
Your friend offers to treat you to dinner. What do you do?
Everyone around you is laughing at something you think is pretty boring. What do you do?
Do you prefer being busy or having a lot of free time?
You're about to buy a popular game when someone else gets the last copy! How do you feel?
You run into a person you've never met before. What do you do?

as.text: Make an excuse to get away!

questions.q: Good news and bad news... which one do you want to hear first?
Hey look! There's someone behind you! So... did you look just now?

as.text: Don't do that! You scared me!
OK, I admit it. You tricked me.
No way. I didn't fall for it.

questions.q: How are your mornings?
You've been invited to a wonderful party. It's time for the party to start, but there's nobody there! What do you do?

as.text: Maybe I have the day wrong?

questions.q: You take off your shoes to realize your socks are different colors! What do you do?
Did you make any New Year's Resolutions?
You're in a completely silent assembly when someone passes gas! What do you do?
You're running a marathon, and when you start you fall flat on your face! What will you do?
You find something at a great bargain price! What do you do?

as.text: Think about whether I need it.

questions.q: You've been asked to do a difficult task. What will you do?
You notice a toy you bought for full price yesterday is marked as half the price today! How do you feel?
Your friend is running a little late to meet you. Is that OK?
Do you think that, no matter what happens, life goes on?
The phone's ringing! What do you do?

as.text: Ignore it and let it ring.

questions.q: Your friend seems to be making plans to hang out, just out of earshot. You think...
Do you think it's important to be fashionably late?
You've won a big raffle ticket! You say...
Do you think blaming someone else on something you did is sometimes necessary?
Your friend suddenly won't listen to you, when everything was fine yesterday. What do you think?
You fail miserably! Everyone found out, and they're disappointed in you... what do you do?
You want to reveal you like someone a whole bunch! What do you do?

as.text: Make it obvious by... playing a prank!
State it clearly for all to hear!
Keep it to myself! It's too risky!

questions.q: The people at the next table are singing for someone's birthday. What do you do?
You're on a stroll when a TV crew pounces you for an interview! What do you do?

as.text: Yuck it up! Woo-hoo! I'm on TV!

questions.q: You see a big and comfortable bed. Your first reaction is to...
You're daydreaming... when your friend sprays you with water! What do you do?

as.points: Impish Impish Jolly Jolly Naive Naive

questions.q: You've been handed a large bag as a souvenir. What do you do?

as.text: Wait until I get home to open it.

questions.q: Have you ever looked at your reflection in a mirror and thought, "What a cool person"?
